attributes.action: Not raise the age of being able to drive a car to 18 and to keep the current age of 17.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment, the current age someone may drive their own car on the road whilst holding a full driving lisence is 17 - should the government change this to 18 it will mean many students will not be able to afford a car or the insurence - making their lives harder.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
